title: Outlook: Sharing Word, Excel, and PowerPoint local files through the new Outlook for Windows
description: When users are in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint apps, and they want to share a file that is saved locally in their device (not stored in a cloud location), the new Outlook for Windows will show up as a share target and they will be able to easily email the file. #newoutlookforwindows. This roadmap status was updated to Launched in error and has been corrected to Rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.
